Posts.Content: I lost my pcp. It was like loosing a family member. I cried forever. I have found another but I still cry for him. He is not dead he is practicing somewhere else. I’d love to see him but I think it’s best to let go. I’m sure where he is my insurance doesn’t allow. I also lost my 2nd pcp after about a year. I now have another I really like she’s young but so nice and caring. I lost 4 other doctors who were great. I get to move with one she takes my insurance. Having a lot of trouble finding replacements for the others. Soon I’m afraid we will have a shortage of doctors and nurses. I keep loosing them every year. Scary!!!!!
Posts.Title: New column: "Grieving the Loss of Your Physician"
